Biography

My name is Austin Spraggins, and I used to be a local truck driver.

After much consideration, I decided to leave that industry and return to college to achieve my Certificate in Web Design and Web Design Associate In Science Degree: Information Systems. Certifications and Degrees in the two fields of technology I thoroughly cherish.

Skills

HTML5. CSS3. SASS. JavaSript. Vue. Linux & Windows Administration.

Passion To Learn everything in Web Design & Development. I enjoy it even at home.

Graphics Design. Audio & Video Engineering/Creating/Editing/Producing & Pusblishing

It & Networking. Imaging. RDP. On-Prem & AWS Cloud Services.

2020 - Current

Clovis Community College

Frontend Web Designer & Developer

Designing and creating web pages for https://www.cloviscollege.edu/ using CASCADE CMS. HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript and learning Vue.js when work has been completed or spare time. I also worked in the IT Department helping them with network switches and servers, reimaging and repurposing laptops and PCs, inventory management of computers, post-configuration of imaged computers, remote tech support and maintaining network infrastructure.

2019 - Current

Google LLC©

Content Creator

Created, managed, branded, designed and maintained a YouTube monetized channel. Video/Audio/Graphic Design creating, editing, producing, social networking, branding and overall running a monetized brand name and video library catalog with quality content and SEO.
